trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Switch to an annual plan, and get all the same benefits at 50% less than the monthly plan:
trans-unit.target: Passa ôn chianu annuali, e ricivi tutti i vantaggi sparagnannu u 50% cu rispettu ôn chianu minzili:

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Cchiù assai di 500 sirbura nna cchiù assai di 30 pajisi

trans-unit.note: Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
Bullet unordered list item in a composer block
trans-unit.source: No logging of your network activity
trans-unit.target: Nuḍḍu riggistru dâ to attività 'n riti

trans-unit.source: Get the same protection, for half the price.
trans-unit.target: Ricivi a stissa prutizzioni, â mità dû prezzu.

trans-unit.source: Save 50% when you switch to an annual plan
trans-unit.target: Sparagna u 50% quannu passi ôn chianu annuali
